meanings.definition: The study of animals that are rumored to exist but have not been proven scientifically.
meanings.sent1: Cryptozoology is an interesting field that explores mysterious creatures.
meanings.sent2: Many enthusiasts enjoy researching cryptozoology to uncover hidden animal species.
meanings.sent3: The professor joked that his next class would be on cryptozoology and unicorns.
meanings.sent4: In the world of cryptozoology, the line between fact and fiction can be blurry.
meanings.sent5: The documentary on cryptozoology made the subject come alive with tales of legendary beasts.

meanings.definition: The search for and study of animals whose existence is unproven.
meanings.sent1: Cryptozoology involves exploring the wilderness for undiscovered creatures.
meanings.sent2: Some scientists dedicate their careers to the pursuit of cryptozoology.
meanings.sent3: During the camping trip, the group decided to engage in a bit of cryptozoology by searching for Bigfoot.
meanings.sent4: The mystery of cryptozoology beckons adventurers to seek out hidden animal species.
meanings.sent5: The thrill of cryptozoology lies in the possibility of encountering mythical creatures in the wild.
